  1. Home
  2. Government
  3. City Elections

Eligibility for City Council candidacy during an election is governed by Title 9, Sec 141.001 of the State of Texas Election Code and by of the City of Watauga Home Rule Charter.  In any case in which the requirements are more restrictive in the City's Home Rule Charter as opposed to the State Election Code, the requirements in the City of Watauga Home Rule Charter prevail.

  • State of Texas Election Code Title 9
  • City of Watauga Home Rule Charter and Code of Ordinances

To qualify to be on the Watauga City Council each member:

1.  Shall have been a resident of the City of Watauga for a period of not less than 12 months immediately preceding his or her election or shall have been a resident of the city or of territory annexed into the City under the provisions of the City Charter during the 12-month period preceding his or her election.

2. Shall be a qualified voter of the State of Texas and the City of Watauga.

3. Shall not be employed by the city.

5. Shall be 21 years of age or older at the time of assuming office.

May 2, 2026, Watauga will hold a general election for Council Places 1, 2, 6, and 7, each for a three-year term expiring in May 2029. There will also be a special election for Council Place 5 to fill the remainder of the term, which expires in May 2028.

First day to file for Place 1, 2, 6, 7 in the general election is January 14, 2026 for a place on the ballot. All applications must be received by the City Secretary's Office located at City Hall, 7105 Whitley Road, Watauga, TX 76148, no later than 5:00 pm on February 13, 2026.

First day to file for Place 5 in the special election is January 5, 2026 for a place on the ballot. All applications must be recieved by the City Secretary's office located at City Hall 7105 Whitley Road, Watauga, TX 76148, no later than 5:00 pm on March 2, 2026 Candidate packets are currently available. Please contact the City Secretary's Office email NOTICE OF DEADLINE TO FILE AN APPLICATION FOR PLACE ON THE BALLOT/ (AVISO DE FECHA LÍMITE PARA PRESENTAR UNA SOLICITUD PARA UN LUGAR EN LA BOLETA)/(THÔNG BÁO THỜI HẠN NỘP ĐƠN XIN GHI TÊN TRÊN LÁ PHIẾU)

Special Election/ Especial/Primaria de/Bầu Cử Đặc Biệt - NOTICE OF DEADLINE TO FILE AN APPLICATION FOR PLACE ON THE BALLOT/(AVISO DE FECHA LÍMITE PARA PRESENTAR UNA SOLICITUD PARA UN LUGAR EN LA BOLETA)/(THÔNG BÁO THỜI HẠN NỘP ĐƠN XIN GHI TÊN TRÊN LÁ PHIẾU)

  • Texas Secretary of State
  • Texas Ethics Commission
